titleStmt.title: A sermon preached at the funeral of that faithful servant of Christ, Robert Breton, D.D. Pastor of Deptford in the county of Kent, Febr. 20. 1671/2. By Richard Parr, D.D. of Camerwel in the county of Surrey.
titleStmt.author: Parr, Richard, 1617-1691.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by W. Godbid, for N Brook, at the Angel in Cornhil.,

notesStmt.note: Roman numerals in imprint date printed with reversed "c"s.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
